mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employees (last_name, first_name, patronymic, gender, date_of_birth, phone_number, mail, employment_date, date_of_dismissal, position, salary, is_chief, department_id) VALUES (#{lastName}, #{firstName}, #{patronymic}, #{gender}, #{dateOfBirth}, #{phoneNumber}, #{mail}, #{employmentDate}, NULL, #{position}, #{salary}, FALSE, #{departmentId})
mapper.select: SELECT exists(SELECT e.id FROM employees e WHERE e.id = #{id})
SELECT exists(SELECT e.id FROM employees e WHERE e.is_chief = TRUE AND e.department_id = #{id})
SELECT exists(SELECT e.id FROM employees e WHERE e.id = #{id} AND e.is_chief = TRUE)
SELECT exists(SELECT d.id FROM departments d WHERE d.id = #{id})
SELECT e.id FROM employees e WHERE e.department_id = #{idDepartment} AND e.is_chief = TRUE
SELECT * FROM employees e WHERE e.is_chief = TRUE AND e.department_id = (SELECT emp.department_id FROM employees emp WHERE emp.id = #{id})
mapper.update: UPDATE employees SET date_of_dismissal = #{dateOfDismissal}, is_chief = FALSE WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE employees SET last_name = #{lastName}, first_name = #{firstName}, patronymic = #{patronymic}, gender = #{gender}, date_of_birth = #{dateOfBirth}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, mail = #{mail}, employment_date = #{employmentDate}, position = #{position}, salary = #{salary}, department_id = #{departmentId} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE employees SET department_id = #{idPointer}, is_chief = FALSE WHERE id = #{idEmployee}
UPDATE departments SET chief_id = NULL WHERE id = (SELECT e.department_id FROM employees e WHERE e.id = #{idChief})

UPDATE employees SET department_id = #{idPointer}, is_chief = FALSE WHERE department_id = #{idSwapped} AND salary <= (SELECT salary FROM employees e WHERE e.department_id = #{idPointer} AND e.is_chief = TRUE)
UPDATE employees SET department_id = #{idPointer}, is_chief = FALSE WHERE department_id = #{idSwapped}
